seo.title: Norddorf | Websites for SMBs | 14 Days, Fixed Price, 100% Ownership
seo.description: Websites that work. Max 14 days delivery, 100% ownership, fixed price of €5,600. SMBs deserve better.

blocks.headline: You need a website that works.
blocks.body: Max 14 days. Fixed price. 100% yours. We build websites that do exactly what you need.

blocks.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
blocks.subheadline: Everything you need to know before we start.

items.question: How long does a project take?

children.text: Maximum 14 days from briefing to launch. Most projects are done in 7-10 days.
€5,600 fixed price. No hidden costs, no surprises. You know from the start what you're paying.

items.question: Do I own the website afterwards?

children.text: Yes, 100%. You get the complete source code, all files, and can host the site wherever you want. No lock-in, no monthly fees to us.
Design, development, responsive for all devices, SEO basics, a content management system for self-editing, and training. Everything you need.

preview.problem: B2B portal needed lead qualification and brand authority.
preview.solution: Custom React stack with intent-based navigation.
preview.result: 3-4x higher conversion rates on qualified traffic.
